item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
1. install steam.
  2. set up an account.
  3. log in, go to “Library” tab.
  4. where it says “All Games”, click the arrow and select “Tools”.
  5. find and double click “Source SDK Base 2007”.
  6. let download complete.
  7. **install Black Mesa to …/steamapps/sourcemods/BMS/
    8 ) restart steam.
  8. go to library, switch back to all games, double click Black Mesa.
  9. play

**I highly recommend using the executable file included in the torrent to handle the installation.

item.dc:creator: your_evil_twin
item.description:
Install Steam (go here https://store.steampowered.com/Steam and in top right side of the screen there is green button Install Steam). Create a Steam account (username and password). Download Black Mesa, install it, and it should automatically find your Steam folder and install Black Mesa in the correct place. And if you try to play Black Mesa without installing Source SDK Base 2007 then I think Steam will automatically download and install the SDK Base for you. (I can’t test that myself though as I already had installed.)
